name: The Every-Person's Zettelkasten [NOTION TEMPLATE]
description: Want a quick and easy way to start using the Zettelkasten method in Notion? No complicated formula's or relations - just a template that gets out of the way and allows you think and write and let ideas bubble to the surface.I created this template for myself as I was reading the book How To Take Smart Notes by Sonke Ahrens. The idea of the Zettelkasten is that it's a system to 'think in.' It shouldn't have to be a system you have to 'think about.' So I designed a system that was easy to use and
